label: Certification
comment: The process of ensuring that a certain object, process, or activity has passed performance and quality assurance tests or qualification requirements.

datatypeProperties.comment: An assertion, expressed as text, for this trade product certification, such as that this product is free from peanuts.
A code specifying an assertion for this trade product certification, such as claims that a product is free from peanuts.
The standard, expressed as text, for this trade product certification.
The agency, expressed as text, responsible for this trade product certification.

referencedBy.comment: A certification applicable to this trade product.
